creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: view of boats and people, with shoreline at right; pale tan arched bridge at center with pedestrians walking over it; weep willow tree in URQ
marks: left: 自摺　昭和拾五年作　蘇州 {jizuri, Shōwa jūgonen saku, S LRC: よし田 {Yoshida}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Suzhou
